original_text:
Hear, O women, the word of the Lord,
    and let your ear receive the word of his mouth;
teach to your daughters a lament,
    and each to her neighbor a dirge.
korean_text: 부녀들이여 여호와의 말씀을 들으라 너희 귀에 그 입의 말씀을 받으라 너희 딸들에게 애곡하게 하고 각기 이웃에게 슬픈 노래를 가르치라

sentences.original_text: Hear, O women, the word of the Lord,
and let your ear receive the word of his mouth;
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 귀로 그의 입의 말씀을 받으라;

sentences.original_text: teach to your daughters a lament,
and each to her neighbor a dirge.
